io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.fileio

Interface ImageFileIOProcessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileIOProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AESEncryptedFileIOProcessor, EncryptedFileIOProcessor

    public ImageFileIOProcessor

    Represents image file IO operations

    • Method Detail

      • writeImage

        void writeImage(@NotNull
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                @NotNull
                android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat compressFormat,
                int quality,
                @NotNull
                java.io.File destination)

        Write Bitmap to the destination File

        Parameters:
        bitmap - the source Bitmap image
        compressFormat - Bitmap.CompressFormat The format of the compressed image
        quality - Int Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size, 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting
        destination - the destination file
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO operation problems
        See Also:
        Bitmap, File

      • readImage

        @Nullable
android.graphics.Bitmap readImage(@NotNull
                                            java.io.File source,
                                            @Nullable
                                            android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options)

        Read Bitmap image from the source File

        Parameters:
        source - the source file object, or null if it could not be decoded.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO operation problems
        See Also:
        Bitmap, File

      • readImage

        @Nullable
android.graphics.Bitmap readImage(@NotNull
                                            android.net.Uri sourceUri,
                                            @Nullable
                                            android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options)

        Read Bitmap image from the source file Uri

        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO operation problems
        See Also:
        Bitmap, Uri
